Looking into the current list of tools available in terms of ai. Currently working on connecting chat, audio generation, image and video generation ( Automatic1111, comfyui). There are other items but currently connecting all of these items while also making sure they are available on a local network via api to help with integrations into other possible applications is tricky enough.

The immediate fixation is getting comfyui to work. Mostly it is a skill issue. The process is to slowly get a few useful workflows put together and make those available one at a time to other applications.
